author: jvanzyl
msg: Small fix for the bug where any #foo, where foo wasn't a valid directive, was rendered w/o the #.
So bgcolor="#FFFFFF" comes out as bgcolor="FFFFFF".  Questions to geir (geirm@optonline.net).

author: jvanzyl
msg: Fix for the $foo! bug reported by Dave Bryson <daveb@miceda-data.com>.   Passes the current testbed cleanly.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Fix for the $foo! bug reported by Dave Bryson <daveb@miceda-data.com>.  Fix modified the grammar a little, resulting in change to the AST, hence the ASTReference.java fix. Passes the current testbed cleanly.
